title: Enhancing Clinical Practical Competencies: Product Design Pedagogy Workshops in Online Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of basic product design theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Assess learners' understanding of the design process with at least 80% accuracy using real-time video interviews.
Design at least three creative project guidelines for product design evaluation in an online environment.
Develop a design feedback mechanism utilizing digital tools (such as 3D modeling software)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
